## Container.addEntryPoint() method

Set entry point, this means than the class selected for the entry point will be executed when the lambda/function is running.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addEntryPoint(entry: {
        new (...args: any[]): IEntryPoint;
    }): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entry | { new (...args: any\[\]): [IEntryPoint](./cloudfunc.ientrypoint.md)<!-- -->; } | Class than implements [IEntryPoint](./cloudfunc.ientrypoint.md) interface |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
